Name: Inferno Rise
Desc:
Flame Fox briefly turns into pure flame and flies forward. For enemies with 5 stacks of Fox's Mischief, causes the flames to run wild, burning them for significant Damage.
Some of Flame Wizard's manual attack skills decrease the cooldown of Inferno Rise - Fox mode after each hit.
Use with the Down key to activate the Inferno Rise - Lion mode. Lock the command to disable the Inferno Rise - Lion mode when using this skill with the Down key.
A Fire Element attack. Requires a Flame Fox.
Command Lock: Right-click

Desc.Old:

Use with the Down key to activate the Inferno Rise - Lion mode. Lock the command to disable the Inferno Rise - Lion mode when using this skill with the Down key.

Command Lock: Right-click

H.Old:
MP Cost: 22. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 630% DAMAGE 6 times.
When hitting enemies with 5 stacks of Fox's Mischief, causes 13 additional attacks at 1824% DAMAGE.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
Cooldown -0.6 sec. on manual attack skill hit
